mainHero.title: Merideo
mainHero.description: Saving busy people time and enabling them to experience new cuisines by connecting them with authentic cooks in their area.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Browse our website to discover new cuisines and pick your meals for the week. You can also learn about the people behind the food in their bio and speak to them about your unique preferences and needs. Our cooks need some time to prepare the food and source fresh ingredients so you might need to allow some time between your order and the delivery.

items.title: Customer User Journey
items.descriptionOne: Preparing home-cooked food for the week can take a long time and might be the last thing you want to do when you come home from work. “We're having pasta bolognese, again?” - we've all been there...
items.descriptionTwo: There are talented chefs in your vicinity who are keen to share their amazing home-cooked meals with you, help you prepare food for the week to come, and enable you to experience new cuisines all at the same time.

items.title: Cook User Journey
items.descriptionOne: We enable cooks to prepare authentic and varied meals from the comfort of their own home, share their culture with others and become financially independent.
items.descriptionTwo: Are you passionate about making authentic food?

features.title: About Us
features.description: This sentence could be a little summary about us, I wouldn't really know what we can place here but we always have the option of removing it!

items.name: Tereza Rusova
items.description: Short description can include what you studied at uni, mentioning Kings and what you're currently up to. Potentially some interests too

items.name: Atheer Musa
items.description: Short description can include what I studied at uni, mentioning Kings and what I'm currently up to. Potentially some interests too

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
